title: Perfect for our purpose
text: Stayed at the Allerton Crowne Plaza this past weekend. We got a rate of $116 on Hotwire. Location of the hotel is awesome - - on the corner of Michigan Ave and Huron. Parking is salty, $36 per night, but there aren't many other choices. Our room was small, but fabulous - - everything extremely clean and like new. The only drawback to this hotel is the lack of a pool. If a pool isn't important, you can't beat the value for a Michigan Avenue stay.
